devdoc.details: This is the Token Smart Contract that will be used to create     tokens for the different companies

burnTokens(bytes32,address,uint256).details: Burn tokens of the worker (action processed when worker exchange tokens)

params._amount: Amount of tokens transfered to worker
params._companyAddress: Address of the company owner of the token
params._workerId: Id of the company worker from DB who wants to burn tokens

createToken(string,string).details: Create a new token by a company

params._name: Id of the company worker from the DB
params._symbol: Id of the company worker from the DB

params._owner: Defines the owner of the contract

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

registerCompany().details: Register a company into the platform

registerWorker(bytes32).details: Register a new company worker inside the company token

params._workerId: Id of the company worker from DB

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * > Note: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setSellingPercentage(uint256).details: Set Selling Value (only owner of the contract)

setTokenActive(bool).details: Create a new token by a company

params._newActiveStatus: New status of the company token (true|false)

setTokenValueConversion(uint256).details: Set Token value conversion (only owner of the contract)

setTrustedSigner(address).details: Set trusted signer (it's the platform address)

params._trustedSigner: address of contract addres who calls transfer

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

transferTokensFromCompanyToWorker(bytes3.details: Transfer tokens from company to worker

params._amount: Amount of tokens transfered to worker
params._workerId: Id of the company worker from DB

transferTokensFromWorkerToWorker(bytes32.details: Transfer tokens from worker to worker

params._amount: Amount of tokens transfered to worker
params._companyAddress: Address of the company owner of the token
params._from: Id of the company worker from DB who sends tokens
params._to: Id of the company worker from DB who receives tokens

params._workerId: Id of the company worker from DB
